text:
Run this code in all clients and see in 2016 works.
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Responsive-two-column-e-mail-module/m-p/403658>

Hello everyone,
When I create a two column custom email modules for drag and drop, can we hide one column in mobile as we can't write media queries.
The drag and drop editor doesnâ€™t support implementing your own media queries, so there is no way to hide/show content with it. The only way is with custom coded emails that gives full code access.
